body:
Hi there,

I don't know if this is the write place to post this issue but, I'm trying to install a python package 'pydigree' by using the simple command:
pip3 install pydigree
and I'm getting the following output:

Collecting pydigree
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/25/e1/b0eaea880d6ac864e5f51141938aafa5887a8809cd9d8c38f61e79cf5e23/pydigree-1.0.1.1.tar.gz

comment_data.body: This is the wrong place to report this. I created a ticket on their side. Please subscribe to it to get updates.

title: Problem installing pydigree
